pages.text: This dainty ring has it all: with the help of a little (or a lot!) of $(c_pink)Pink Ink$(), it strengthens you from the inside out and grants you additional hearts.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Infuse it with $(l:magic/ink)Pink Ink$(/l) in a $(l:magic/color_picker)Color Picker$() to increase the amount of extra hearts provided.
